rules_text:
Pillage [i](Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are nine or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may transform Ceaseless Butcher.
rules_text2:
Ward–Sacrifice a creature.
At the beginning of combat, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, Galdur, Fell God gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the exiled card’s mana value.
